title: Is business technology a good career? - Quora

response.answer_text: Business technology can be a very good career. Outside of avionics and mechanical control systems, all you have is business technology. While my career began before we had the World Wide Web as we know it today, there was always demand for problem solving skills and developers who could implement technology solutions across a business enterprise. Seriously, there is still no shortage of opportunities and needs. And it can be very rewarding. All you need is the ability to define a problem.
Business is not a technology it is a process of trading. Technology is a good business however.
